item.description:
After 54 years, it's here!

Come join us for a group [not collective] screening of Ayn Rand's "Atlas Shrugged".

 

This is for the 7:15 show, but we should meet there 15 minutes early to hook up.

 

There has also been a strong suggetion made that after the show we remove ourselves to quaint Newburyport Port for a few beers to either celebrate the triumphant redention of this classic to the silver screen, or to grumble about the horribly failed attempt to bring this grand epic to the masses. Triumph or horrible failure: beer goes good with either.

 

Note: Please check your altruism at the theater door.
item.name: Go see Atlas Shrugged on the Big Screen
